page.topic: Specifying the Menu for a Layout
page.description: To specify the toolbar for a form, browse, report, letter, or label:

step.description: Optionally design custom menu(s) and save them. See How to Design a Custom Menu.
Open the layout in design mode and press F12 to access its Properties dialog.
Click to open the Menus View list and/or the Menus View right click list and select your newly designed menu.
